version_description:
- Bug fixes and minor improvements.

We are working hard to continually improve Shudder. Stay tuned for more! If you have any trouble please contact us at support@shudder.com

This new version allows you to find movies and series in the Shudder catalogue using Spotlight Search on your iPhone or iPad. This version also includes fixes to improve app performance.

We are working hard to continually improve Shudder. Stay tuned for more! If you have any trouble please contact us at support@shudder.com

Check out our brand new landing page for series, redesigned to make browsing and binge-watching easier than ever.

We are working hard to continually improve Shudder. Stay tuned for more! If you have any trouble please contact us at support@shudder.com

- Check out our brand new designs for movie pages
- Fixed Chromecast streaming bugs

We are working hard to continually improve Shudder. Stay tuned for more! If you have any trouble please contact us at support@shudder.com

- Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

We are working hard to continually improve Shudder. Stay tuned for more! If you have any trouble please contact us at support@shudder.com

Check out Shudder’s brand new look and feel!

We are continually expanding our library of movies and TV series in the thriller, paranormal and suspense genres, in addition to horrors. If you have any suggestions on what you would like to see more of, or encounter any issues with the app, please contact us at support@shudder.com

Check out Shudder’s brand new look and feel!

We are continually expanding our library of movies and TV series in the thriller, paranormal and suspense genres, in addition to horrors. If you have any suggestions on what you would like to see more of, or encounter any issues with the app, please contact us at support@shudder.com

Bug Fixes and Performance Enhancements

We are continually expanding our library of movies and TV series in the thriller, paranormal and suspense genres, in addition to horrors. If you have any suggestions on what you would like to see more of, or encounter any issues with the app, please contact us at support@shudder.com

Shudder is now available in Germany and Austria!

We are continually expanding our library of movies and TV series in the thriller, paranormal, suspense and horror genres. If you have any suggestions on what you would like to see more of, or encounter any issues with the app, please contact us at support@shudder.com

We are continually updating the app to improve your Shudder experience. This version includes updates for iPhone X, improved closed captioning management from the video player.

We are continually expanding our library of movies and TV series in the genres. If you have any issues with the app, or suggestions on the types of thriller, paranormal, suspense or horror movies and series you would like to see more of, please contact us at support@shudder.com

This update includes improvements to notifications and promoted app subscription.

Our app updates get rid of any gremlins that find their way into the system. In this fix, we’ve updated our navigation to make it even easier to find something great to watch! We’ve also brought My List to the home page so you can instantly find the titles you’ve saved.
In this version, we got rid of a few gremlins to make the app look better.

This version includes an update to our video player so that you can rewind or fast-forward more easily.

This version includes enhanced podcast support. You can now lock your screen or navigate to other apps while listening to a Shudder podcast.

We are working hard to continually improve Shudder. This version includes bug fixes for new users on the iPhone. If you encounter any issues, please contact us at support@shudder.com

Now, when you sign up for Shudder, we'll highlight some our top titles for you to add to your My List so you can get streaming even faster.  If you encounter any issues, please contact us at support@shudder.com

In this version we’ve made updates to the look of our new user sign-up flow.
